3 repeat of color pattern finishing 1 weave in ends 2 sew the front and back pieces together from the first 12 row and the last 12 row on both sides with color d single_crochet a border along the front neckline and the back 3 sew the sleeve to create a seam so the sleeve is round repeat for second sleeve 4 with color d crochet 3 row of 26 clusters starting from the bottom of the back piece this will make an opening for the sleeves *do not attach to the front side yet 5 with color d sew the sleeve onto
